name: Action
description: Stories driven by intense physical activity, battles, or dangerous scenarios. The protagonist often faces high-stakes challenges involving combat, survival, or conflict resolution.

name: Adventure
description: Focuses on exploring new worlds, uncovering mysteries, or embarking on epic journeys. Adventure stories often include a sense of wonder and discovery.

name: Comedy
description: Lighthearted tales filled with humor, playful characters, and exaggerated scenarios. The goal is to entertain and amuse readers.

name: Drama
description: Emotionally intense stories that focus on character relationships, struggles, and development. Often revolves around realistic or relatable conflicts.

name: Fantasy
description: Set in imaginative worlds with magical elements, mythical creatures, and epic quests. These stories often explore the boundaries of creativity.

name: Gender Bender
description: Involves characters experiencing a change in gender, whether through transformation, disguise, or identity shift, leading to unique challenges or humorous situations.

name: Harem
description: A protagonist is surrounded by multiple characters vying for their affection, often leading to romantic or comedic situations.

name: Historical
description: Stories set in past time periods, often reflecting cultural, political, or social aspects of that era.

name: Horror
description: Designed to evoke fear or suspense, these stories often involve supernatural elements, grotesque creatures, or psychological terror.

name: Josei
description: Aimed at adult women, focusing on mature themes such as relationships, careers, and personal growth.

name: Martial Arts
description: Emphasizes combat techniques, training, and philosophies associated with martial disciplines.

name: Mystery
description: Revolves around solving puzzles, uncovering secrets, or investigating crimes, often with twists and turns.

name: Psychological
description: Explores the inner workings of the human mind, focusing on mental conflicts, motivations, and moral dilemmas.

name: Romance
description: Centers around love stories and relationships, exploring emotional connections between characters.

name: School Life
description: Focuses on daily life in school settings, often involving friendships, rivalries, and youthful experiences.

name: Sci-fi
description: Features futuristic technology, space exploration, or speculative science-based worlds.

name: Seinen
description: Aimed at adult male audiences, offering mature storytelling with darker themes.

name: Shoujo
description: Targeted at young female audiences, emphasizing romance, emotions, and personal growth.

name: Shounen
description: Aimed at young male audiences, featuring action-packed adventures and character growth.

name: Slice of Life
description: Depicts ordinary life in a realistic manner, focusing on relatable and heartfelt moments.

name: Sports
description: Revolves around athletics, teamwork, and the challenges of sportsmanship.

name: Supernatural
description: Features elements beyond the natural world, such as spirits, ghosts, or mystical powers.

name: Thriller
description: High-stakes, suspenseful narratives that keep readers on edge, often with twists and dangers.

name: Tragedy
description: Highlights sorrow, loss, or downfall, delivering an emotionally impactful narrative.
